div.class: col-lg-12 col-md-12 post-1501 page type-page status-publish hentry

div.p: Prepa Tec High School is a public, tuition-free charter school funded through state and federal dollars like traditional schools. Open to all students, Prepa Tec is the vehicle realized by Xavier Reyes and several families that worked together with the goal of offering an education that will bring a love of learning to the classroom for their children and yours.

The intent of the Prepa Tec Charter was to become a continuum school for the International Baccalaureate Program, offering the Primary Years Program (PYP), the Middle Years Program (MYP) and the Diploma Program (DP), and finally the Career-Related Programme (CP). It takes approximately three years to implement and become authorized for each program. In May 2019, Prepa Tec participated in a spring 2019 Authorization visit from the International Baccalaureate for the Diploma Programme and is now an authorized International Baccalaureate Diploma Programme (DP). We will be submitting the application for Authorization for the Middle Years Programme (MYP) this year.
IB Schools have eight subject groups. Prepa Tec High School currently offers all eight subjects to the 9th and 11th graders, including:

Language and Literature
Language Acquisition (Spanish)
Individuals and Societies (World Geography and World History)
Sciences (Biology and Chemistry)
Mathematics (Algebra I and Geometry)
Arts (Visual Arts)
Physical and Health Education
Design
The Diploma Programme offers six subjects to students, with a variety of choices. Please look for communication regarding our exciting course offerings for next school year from Mr. Aguirre.
You may contact your school office during regular business hours through the duration of Alta’s closure at these temporary phone numbers:

Academia Moderna: 323-923-0383 or 323-707-4696
Clarendon Site-Prepa Tec Middle School: 323-800-2739 or 323-875-9247
Stafford Site-Prepa Tec Middle/High School: 323-800-2739 or 323-875-9247
Gage Site-Prepa Tec High School: 323-800-2743 or 323-8002738

a.title: PTLAMS student featured in CharterNation Blog

a.title: PTLAMS student featured in CharterNation Blog

div.p: PTLAMS student featured in CharterNation Blog Prepa Tec Middle School student, Kailyn Baca, is featured in today’s CharterNation Blog. Read the full story here: CharterNation Blog April 20, 2020

To be featured in the Virtual Spirit Week, tag @asb_prepatechigh on your IG story or DM your submission. Include your name & grade to be randomly selected to win a $10. gift card (virtually sent to you.)

div.p: HW packets # 1 can be turned in after Spring Break! Dear Prepa Tec Parents: Good afternoon. Hope you are all well. Just a reminder that if you did not turn in the first homework packets this past Friday. Please do not worry, you can return packets after Spring Break.... Read More
